name: feathers-localstorage
description: A client side service based on @feathersjs/memory that persists to LocalStorage

scripts.add-dist: npm run clean && npm run build && git add dist/ --force && git commit -am "Updating dist"
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist/ && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run webpack && npm run webpack:production
scripts.publish: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator -u feathersjs-ecosystem -p feathers-localstorage && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.release:patch: npm run add-dist && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run add-dist && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run add-dist && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run dtslint && npm run coverage
